ygData.subject: RE: Ice Crystal staff and Quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know, the Ice Crytal Staff doesn t come from Perma. Not from a goblin atleast, maybe it s on an Ice Giant, or something beyond the 30- goblins
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know, the Ice Crytal Staff doesn't come from Perma. Not from a
goblin atleast, maybe it's on an Ice Giant, or something beyond the 30-
goblins around there (or could be a rare on something in the 'Patriach
room', as some have called it). The PReacher has The CIM (Cold Iron
Morningstar) or a (much rarer) Runed Circlet.

-----Original Message-----
From: Reuben Aguilar [mailto:reuben@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 3:28 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Ice Crystal staff and Quest?


From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>

Hi there,

Im in permafrost and I have been hunting for the mob that has the Ice
Crystal Staff. I was under the impression that it was the Preacher that had
it. But I can't seem to get it.. Anyone know if it is the preacher or is it
in another area ?

Also, I read on everlore that the staffs are part of a quest. Somehow you
can use the Water Crystal Staff and starts a long quest to get a great mage
useable one handed magic staff or something... Im curious if any of you have
any idea as to what it is ?

Thanks

Reuben
